objectives_summary: Pass any Quality Engineer Certification exam in the first attempt

items.title: Quality Management Systems:Management and Control of Quality
items.headline: Learn to Build, Implement, and Sustain a Performance Excellence Culture into Your Organisation
objectives_summary: You will be able to develop, implement, and sustain a performance excellence culture and improve overall organizational effectiveness and capabilities
You will have the ability to apply the basic principles of QM and performance excellence, improve your processes and satisfy your customers and employees
You will understand the various perspectives from which quality is viewed in order to fully appreciate its role in the many parts of a business organization

items.title: Operations Management A-Z: Business Processes and Systems
items.headline: Operations Management: Supply Chain & Business Processes in Industry for Manufacturing and Services Organizations
objectives_summary: Become the operations management guru in your company! Combine core understanding with powerful tools and techniques
Gain a total overview of operations management for manufacturing and service businesses
Increase your profitability, improve delivery and use your resources more efficiently

items.title: Supply Chain Operations Metrics and KPI's
items.headline: Learn to Create Value, Improve Performance, and Drive the Success of Your Supply Chain Management System
objectives_summary: You’ll have the ability to objectively assess your current supply chain function, identify the gaps in its performance, and build a foundation for improvement
You’ll learn how to ramp up the operational control of your organisation’s delivery performance, its responsiveness, cost and asset management
You’ll know how to redesign and optimise your supply chain network by implementing best practices in various areas
